posts.post_content:
I’ve got a group of T206 polar bear cards for sale. Cards under $100 are priced shipped PWE. Marquard is priced shipped with tracking. PayPal FF. Add $5 for tracking for other cards. Crossposted. Happy to send closer photos of any cards. (I’m currently quarantining with Covid, so I won’t be able to ship with tracking until Monday; PWE can go out immediately)

Rube Marquard (Throwing) (HOF) - $125
Al Burch (Fielding) - $55
Frank Arellanes - $50 **SOLD**
Izzy Hoffman - $38
Moose Grimshaw - $40 **SOLD**
Dick Hoblitzell - $38 **SOLD**
Art Fromme - $35 **SOLD**
Tom Downey (Batting) - $35 **SOLD**
Harry Davis (Davis on Front) - $38
Harry Krause (Throwing) (hole) - $35
I’d do a lot price of $300 shipped on the 6 remaining cards.
